testcase.system-out: Test: Start  Test0 Scenario is as follows 1.Unlock phone, clear recent apps, clear internal memory 2.Call Image() and Capture Rear camera 25 images for default resolution in uSD card and Verify the data capture 3.Call Video() and record Rear camera video of first 2 resloutions for 2 minutes of duration in uSD Card and verify the same 4.Call Format() and format uSD card with data and verify the same Setting up the appium desired capabilities  Host does'nt support clear recent apps option! Hence Skiping clear recent apps scenario Launch File Manager Application and clear internal memory Swipe up and select uSD card Select Internal storage Select More options click on Select all Select Delete permanently Select More options Select Delete permanently Select Delete Pass: Clearing phone internal memory is successfull Calling Image() for rear Image capture in uSD Card and Verify the Captured images  Launch Camera Application for Rear picture capture change to SD card element not found : org.openqa.selenium.NoSuchElementException: An element could not be located on the page using the given search parameters.
